headline: Q1 Rundown: Biogen (NASDAQ:BIIB) Vs Other Therapeutics Stocks
summary: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how therapeutics stocks fared in Q1, starting with Biogen (NASDAQ:BIIB).
